title: Dover Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2022 Results - PR Newswire
summary: Dover is a diversified global manufacturer and solutions provider, reporting $8.5 billion in 2022 revenue.  The company is committed to sustainability through its products and operations, and in 2022, invested $139.4 million in research and development. Dover took several measures in 2022 to improve productivity and efficiency, including e-commerce adoption, back-office consolidation, and SKU complexity reduction.

title: Kohler Previews New 26kW Home Standby Generator and New Exclusive Colors at CES 2023 USA - English - USA ... - PR Web
summary: Kohler Co. has introduced exclusive color options and a new 26kW air-cooled home standby generator at CES 2023. The new color options, available later in 2023, include 10 popular home colors. These colors allow homeowners to match their generator to their home's exterior, or they can instead choose a camouflage pattern from Mossy Oak.  The new 26kW generator provides more power than previous models, while also being more durable and quieter. Kohler offers a 5-year limited warranty on all of its generators, which includes coverage for parts, labor, and travel.

title: Kohler Co. Celebrates 150 Years of Bold Moves, Creativity, and Impact While Shaping the Next 150 Years of Its Iconic ... - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co., founded in 1873, is celebrating its 150th anniversary by launching new products, hosting events, and partnering with artists and explorers to promote design, innovation, wellness, and sustainability. Kohler has a long history of innovation, including being the first company to introduce colorful bathroom fixtures in 1927. The company is also committed to sustainability, and its Believing in Better strategy focuses on developing products and programs that have a meaningful impact on the planet, people, communities, and business.

title: Kohler Co. Appoints Laura Kohler as Company's First Chief Sustainability and DEI Officer - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co. has announced that Laura Kohler will be the company's first Chief Sustainability and Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI) Officer. This new appointment continues the company’s legacy of gracious living and marks a significant step forward in accelerating the incorporation of sustainability, social impact and DEI across Kohler’s global Kitchen & Bath, Energy and Hospitality business groups and product portfolios.  Laura, who most recently held the title of SVP – Human Resources, Stewardship and Sustainability, has helped to formalize and strengthen Kohler's commitment to environmental sustainability and social impact.  Laura, under the leadership of David Kohler, will help the company fully focus on this effort at every level, while also fostering a culture of innovation and inclusion in all aspects of the Kohler experience.

title: Kohler Showcases Kitchen and Bath Category Leadership at CES 2023 with New Smart Innovations and Designs to ... - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler Co., founded in 1873, is showcasing its latest smart home products at CES 2023, including smart showering systems, water monitoring systems, and smart toilets. These products are designed to enhance people's well-being at home while leveraging technology to provide smart water delivery and management. Kohler is also introducing Remote Diagnostics to provide the highest level of customer care for trouble shooting products using the KOHLER Konnect mobile app.

title: KOHLER PRESENTS HERITAGE COLORS - PR Newswire
summary: Kohler, a company founded in 1873, is celebrating its 150th year of design leadership by launching the Heritage Colors campaign, a year-long series of celebratory initiatives honoring the company's innovative use of color in its products. Kohler is also hosting two events in New York City featuring a 'Heritage Colors' pop-up truck, where people can vote for their favorite color and learn more about the campaign.
